1. City Council

City Council
============

The following calendars include regular City Council meetings only.
2025 Council Calendar
2026 Council Calendar

\*Special City Council meetings will be called on an as needed basis and are not reflected on the annual Council Calendar.


![City Seal](https://www.burlesontx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=21712)

To Contact Council (
[email all members](http://www.burlesontx.com/FormCenter/Application-for-Boards-Commissions--Comm-7/Contact-your-City-Council-73)
). Request an appearance
[by Mayor orÂ City Council](https://www.burlesontx.com/FormCenter/Application-for-Boards-Commissions-Commi-7/Request-an-Appearance-by-the-Mayor-or-Ci-75)
.

The City of Burleson operates under a council-city manager form of government. Citizens are represented on the City Council by the mayor and 6 council members, all elected at large to serve 3-year terms.

* [Chris Fletcher, Mayor](https://www.burlesontx.com/129/Mayor)
* [Victoria Johnson, Council Place 1](https://www.burlesontx.com/121/Council-Place-1)
* [Phil Anderson, Council Place 2](https://www.burlesontx.com/122/Council-Place-2)
* Alexa Boedeker
  , Council Place 3
* [Larry Scott, Council Place 4](https://www.burlesontx.com/124/Council-Place-4)
* [Dan McClendon, Council Place 5 & Mayor Pro Tem](https://www.burlesontx.com/125/Council-Place-5)
* [Adam Russell, Council Place 6](https://www.burlesontx.com/127/Council-Place-6)
